ingredients: 3 tablespoons Chinese rice wine or dry sherry wine
2 tablespoons black bean and garlic paste, Sun Luck Gluten-free preferred
2 tablespoons gluten-free hoisin sauce, Sun Luck Gluten-free preferred
1 to 2 teaspoons white peppercorns (or Sichuan peppercorns for spicy version)
4 to 5 whole dried red chili peppers, with or without seeds, optional (spicy)
½ cup thinly sliced scallion, green parts only
